metadata.synopsis: The player has killed Nightsong, making Ketheric vulnrable and causing him to retreat to the top of Moonrise. Z'rell wait's outside the entreance of Moonrise for the predicted arrival of the player (or whoever would have caused this terrible crime).
metadata.how_to_trigger: load SCL_Main_Aoe moonightsongdeath_alivego to -152; 21; -98Walk accross the bridge (but far enough away to not trigger dialog with Z'rell)Wait for ADs

0.speaker: Disciple Z'rell
0.text: If so much as a rat crosses that bridge, cut its throat.

1.speaker: Disciple Z'rell
1.text: That True Soul did this. I was blind to miss the signs.

2.speaker: Disciple Z'rell
2.text: The Absolute's plan hasn't changed - not a jot. We hold the line.

3.speaker: Disciple Z'rell
3.text: I hope they at least slit that rat Balthazar from navel to nose.
